chapter.text: 38|1|svad‌- ulbeadhanam ulkeallunna khur'an tanne satyam
38|2|ennal satyanisedhikal durabhimanattilum kaksi matsaryattilumakunnu
38|3|avarkk mump etrayetra talamurakale nam nasippiccu. appeal avar muravilikutti. ennal at raksaprapikkanulla samayamalla
38|4|avaril ninnutanneyulla oru takkitukaran avarute atuttu vannatil avarkk ascaryam teanniyirikkunnu. satyanisedhikal parannu: ivan kallavadiyaya oru jalavidyakkaranakunnu
38|5|ivan pala daivannale orearra daivamakkiyirikkukayanea? tirccayayum it oru atbhutakaramaya karyam tanne

38|6|avarile pradhanikal (iprakaram parannu keant‌) peayi: ninnal munneatt peayikkealluka. ninnalute daivannalute karyattil ninnal ksamapurvvam uraccunilkkukayum ceyyuka. tirccayayum it uddesapurvvam ceyyappetunna oru karyam tanneyakunnu
38|7|avasanatte matattil itine parri nannal kelkkukayuntayittilla. it oru krtrima srsti matramakunnu
38|8|nannalute itayil ninn ulbeadhanam irakkappettat ivanre melanea? annaneyeannumalla. avar enre ulbeadhanattepparri tanne sansayattilakunnu. alla, avar enre siksa ituvare asvadikkukayuntayittilla
38|9|atalla, pratapiyum atyudaranumaya ninre raksitavinre karunyattinre khajanavukal avarute pakkalanea
38|10|atalla, akasannaluteyum bhumiyuteyum avaykkitayilullatinreyum adhipatyam avarkkanea? enkil a margannalilute avar kayarineakkatte
38|11|pala kaksikalil petta parajayappetan peakunna oru sainikavyuhamatre aviteyullat‌
38|12|avarkk mump nuhinre janatayum, ad samudayavum, anikalurappiccirunna phir'aunum nisedhiccu talliyittunt‌
38|13|thamud samudayavum, lutvinre janatayum, marakkuttannalil vasiccirunnavarum (satyatte nisedhiccu talliyittunt‌.) akkuttaratre (satyattinetiril aniniranna) kaksikal
38|14|ivararum tanne dutanmare nisedhiccu kalayatirunnittilla. annane enre siksa (avaril) anivaryamayittirnnu
38|15|orearra ghearasabdamallate marreannum ikkuttar neakkiyirikkunnilla. (atu sambhaviccu kalinnal) ottum savakasamuntayirikkukayilla
38|16|avar parayunnu: nannalute raksitave, vicaranayute divasattinu mump tanne nannalkkulla (siksayute) vihitam nannalkkeannu vegattilakkitannekkane enn‌

38|17|(nabiye,) avar parayunnatinepparri ni ksamiccu kealluka. nam'mute kaiyyukkulla dasanaya davudine ni anusmarikkukayum ceyyuka. tirccayayum addeham (daivattinkalekk‌) erravum adhikam khediccumatanniyavanakunnu
38|18|sandhyasamayattum, suryeadaya samayattum steatrakirttanam natattunna nilayil nam parvvatannale addehatteateappam kilpetuttuka tanne ceytu
38|19|sekharikkappetta nilayil paravakaleyum (nam kilpetutti.) ellam tanne addehattinkalekk erravum adhikam vinayatteate tirinnavayayirunnu
38|20|addehattinre adhipatyam nam susaktamakkukayum, addehattin nam tatvajnanavum tirppukalpikkuvan venta sansaravaibhavavum nalkukayum ceytu
38|21|valakk kutunna kaksikal prart'thanamandapattinre matil kayariccenna samayatte varttamanam ninakk labhiccittuntea

38|22|avar davudinre atutt katannu cellukayum, addeham avarepparri paribhrantanakukayum ceyta sandarbham! avar parannu. tankal bhayappetenta. nannal rant etir kaksikalakunnu. nannalil oru kaksi marukaksiyeat an'yayam ceytirikkunnu. atinal nannalkkitayil tankal n'yayaprakaram vidhi kalpikkanam. tankal nitiket kanikkarut‌. nannalkk neraya patayilekk vali kanikkanam

38|23|ita, ivan enre saheadaranakunnu. avann teannurri ompatu pennatukalunt‌. enikk oru pennatum. ennitt avan parannu; atineyum kuti enikk elpiccu taranamenn‌. sambhasanattil avan enne tealpicc kalayukayum ceytu

38|24|addeham (davud‌) parannu: tanre pennatukalute kuttattilekk ninre pennatine kuti avasyappettatu mukhena avan ninneat aniti kanikkuka tanne ceytirikkunnu. tirccayayum pankalikalil (kuttukaril) palarum parasparam atikramam kanikkukayan ceyyunnat‌. visvasikkukayum salkarm'mannal pravarttikkukayum ceytavarealike. valare kuracc pereyullu attarakkar. davud vicariccu; nam addehatte pariksikkuka tanneyan ceytatenn‌. tutarnn addeham tanre raksitavineat papameacanam tetukayum addeham kumpittu keant vilukayum khediccumatannukayum ceytu
38|25|appeal addehattin nam at pearuttukeatuttu. tirccayayum addehattin nam'mute atukkal samipyavum matannivaran uttamamaya sthanavumunt‌

38|26|(allahu parannu:) he; davud‌, tirccayayum ninne nam bhumiyil oru pratinidhiyakkiyirikkunnu. akayal janannalkkitayil n'yayaprakaram ni vidhikalpikkuka. tannistatte ni pintutarnnu peakarut‌. karanam at allahuvinre margattil ninn ninne terriccukalayum. allahuvinre margattil ninn terrippeakunnavararea avarkk tanneyakunnu kathinamaya siksayullat‌. kanakkuneakkunna divasatte avar marannukalannatinre phalamatre at‌
38|27|akasavum bhumiyum avaykkitayilullatum nam nirart'thakamayi srsticcatalla. satyanisedhikalute dharanayatre at‌. akayal satyanisedhikalkk narakasiksayal mahanasam
38|28|atalla, visvasikkukayum salkarm'mannal pravarttikkukayum ceytavare bhumiyil kulappamuntakkunnavare peale nam akkumea? atalla, dharm'manistha palikkunnavare dustanmare peale nam akkumea
38|29|ninakk nam avatarippiccutanna anugrhita granthamatre it‌. itile drstantannalepparri avar cinticcu neakkunnatinum bud'dhimanmar ulbud'dharakentatinum venti
38|30|davudin nam sulaimane (putran) pradanam ceytu. valare nalla dasan! tirccayayum addeham (allahuvinkalekk‌) erravum adhikam khediccumatannunnavanakunnu
38|31|kuticceatan tayyarayi nilkkunna visistamaya kutirakal vaikunneram addehattinre mumpil pradarsippikkappetta sandarbham
38|32|appeal addeham parannu: enre raksitavinre smaranayute atisthanattilan aisvaryatte nan snehiccittullat‌. annane ava (kutirakal) maravil peayi marannu
38|33|(appeal addeham parannu:) ninnal avaye enre atuttekk tiriccu keant varu. ennitt addeham (avayute) kanankalukalilum kaluttukalilum tatavan tutanni
38|34|sulaimane nam pariksikkukayuntayi. addehattinre sinhasanattinmel nam oru jadatte itukayum ceytu. pinnit addeham talmayullavanayi matanni

38|35|addeham parannu. enre raksitave, ni enikk pearuttutarikayum enikk sesam oralkkum tarappetatta oru rajavalca ni enikk pradanam ceyyukayum ceyyename. tirccayayum ni tanneyan erravum valiya danasilan
38|36|appeal addehattin karrine nam kilpetuttikeatuttu. addehattinre kalpana prakaram addeham laksyamakkiyetattekk semyamaya nilayil at sancarikkunnu
38|37|ella kettitanirmana vidagd'dharum munnal vidagd'dharumaya pisacukkaleyum (addehattinnu kilpetuttikeatuttu)
38|38|cannalakalil bandhikkappetta marru cilare (pisacukkale)yum (adhinappetuttikeatuttu)
38|39|it nam'mute danamakunnu. akayal ni audaryam ceyyukayea kaivasam vecc keallukayea ceyyuka. kanakku ceadikkal untavilla. (enn nam sulaimaneat parayukayum ceytu)
38|40|tirccayayum addehattin nam'mute atukkal samipyamunt‌. matanniyettan uttamamaya sthanavum
38|41|nam'mute dasanaya ayyubine ormikkuka. pisac enikk avasatayum pidanavum elpiccirikkunnu enn tanre raksitavine vilicc addeham paranna sandarbham
38|42|(nam nirdesiccu:) ninre kalukeant ni cavittuka, ita! tanutta snanajalavum kutinirum
38|43|addehattin addehattinre svantakkareyum avareateappam avarute atra alukaleyum nam pradanam ceyyukayum ceytu. nam'mute pakkal ninnulla karunyavum bud'dhimanmarkk oru ulbeadhanavumenna nilayil

38|44|oru piti pull ninre kaiyil etukkuka. ennitt atu keant ni atikkukayum sapatham langhikkatirikkukayum ceyyuka. tirccayayum addehatte nam ksamasilanayi kantu. valare nalla dasan! tirccayayum addeham ere khediccumatannunnavanakunnu
38|45|kaikkaruttum kalcappatukalum ullavarayirunna nam'mute dasanmaraya ibrahim, isakh‌, ya'akhub ennivareyum orkkuka
38|46|niskalankamaya oru vicaram keant nam avare ulkrstarakkiyirikkunnu. paraleaka smaranayatre at‌
38|47|tirccayayum avar nam'mute atukkal terannetukkappetta uttamanmaril pettavarakunnu
38|48|isma'il, alyasa'a‌, dulkiphl ennivareyum orkkuka. avarellavarum uttamanmaril pettavarakunnu
38|49|itearu ulbeadhanamatre. tirccayayum suksmatayullavarkk matanniccellan uttamamaya sthanamunt‌
38|50|avarkk venti kavatannal turannuveccittulla sthiravasattinre svargatteappukal
38|51|avar avite cari irunnu visramiccu keant samrd'dhamayulla phalavargannalkkum paniyattinum avasyappett keantirikkum
38|52|avarute atutt drsti niyantrikkunna samavayaskkaraya strikaluntayirikkum
38|53|itatre vicaranayute divasattekk ninnalkk vagdanam nalkappetunnat‌
38|54|tirccayayum it nam nalkunna upajivanamakunnu. at tirnnu peakunnatalla
38|55|itatre (avarute avastha). tirccayayum dhikkarikalkk matanniccellan measappetta sthanamanullat‌
38|56|narakamatre at‌. avar atil katti'eriyum. atetra measamaya visramasthanam
38|57|itanavarkkullat‌. akayal avar at asvadiccu keallatte. keatum cutulla vellavum keatum tanuppulla vellavum
38|58|ittarattilppetta marru pala inam siksakalum
38|59|(narakattil adyamettiyavareat allahu parayum:) ita, orukuttam ninnaleateappam tallikkayari varunnu. (appeal avar parayum:) avarkk svagatamilla. tirccayayum avar narakattil katti'eriyunnavaratre
38|60|avar (a katann varunnavar) parayum; alla, ninnalkk tanneyan svagatamillattat‌. ninnalan nannalkkit varuttiveccat‌. appeal vasasthalam citta tanne
38|61|avar parayum: nannalute raksitave, nannalkk it (siksa) varuttiveccatarea avann ni narakattil iratti siksa vard'dhippiccu keatukkename
38|62|avar parayum: namukkentu parri! durjanannalil pettavarayi nam ganiccirunna pala alukaleyum nam kanunnillallea
38|63|nam avare (abad'dhattil) parihasapatramakkiyatanea? atalla, avareyum vitt kannukal tennippeayatanea
38|64|narakavasikal tam'milulla valakk‌- tirccayayum atearu yathart'thyam tanneyan‌
38|65|(nabiye,) parayuka: nanearu munnariyippukaran matraman‌. ekanum sarvvadhipatiyumaya allahuvallate yatearu daivavumilla
38|66|akasannaluteyum bhumiyuteyum avaykkitayilullatinreyum raksitavum pratapasaliyum ere pearukkunnavanumatre avan
38|67|parayuka: at oru geravamulla varttamanamakunnu
38|68|ninnal at avaganiccu kalayunnavarakunnu
38|69|atyunnata samuham vivadam natattiyirunna sandarbhattepparri enikk yatearu arivum untayirunnilla
38|70|nanearu spastamaya takkitukaranayirikkentatin matraman enikk sandesam nalkappetunnat‌
38|71|ninre raksitav malakkukaleat paranna sandarbham: tirccayayum nan kalimannil ninnum oru manusyane srstikkan peakukayan‌
38|72|annane nan avane sanvidhanikkukayum, avanil enre atmavil ninn nan utukayum ceytal ninnal avann pranamam ceyyunnavarayi vilanam
38|73|appeal malakkukal ellavarum onnatankam pranamam ceytu
38|74|iblis olike. avan ahankarikkukayum satyanisedhikalute kuttattilakukayum ceytu

38|75|avan (allahu) parannu: iblise, enre kaikeant nan srsticcuntakkiyatine ni pranamikkunnatin ninakkent tatas'samanuntayat‌? ni ahankariccirikkukayanea, atalla ni peannaccakkarute kuttattil pettirikkukayanea
38|76|avan (iblis‌) parannu: nan avane (manusyane)kkal uttamanakunnu. enne ni agniyil ninn srsticcu. avane ni kalimannil ninnum srsticcu
38|77|avan (allahu) parannu: ennal ni ivite ninn puratt peakanam. tirccayayum ni attiyakarrappettavanakunnu
38|78|tirccayayum n'yayavidhiyute nal vareyum ninre mel enre sapam untayirikkunnatan‌
38|79|avan (iblis‌) parannu: enre raksitave, ennal avar uyirttelunnelpikkappetunna divasam vare ni enikk avadhi anuvadiccu tarename
38|80|(allahu) parannu: ennal ni avadhi anuvadikkappettavarute kuttattil tanneyakunnu
38|81|niscitamaya a samayam samagatamakunna divasam vare
38|82|avan (iblis‌) parannu: ninre pratapamana satyam; avare muluvan nan valiterrikkuka tanne ceyyum
38|83|avaril ninre niskalankaraya dasanmarealike
38|84|avan (allahu) parannu: appeal satyam itatre- satyame nan parayukayullu
38|85|ninneyum avaril ninn ninne pintutarnna muluvan pereyum keant nan narakam nirakkuka tanne ceyyum
38|86|(nabiye,) parayuka: itinre peril ninnaleat nan yatearu pratiphalavum ceadikkunnilla. nan krtrimam ketticcamaykkunnavarute kuttattilumalla
38|87|it leakarkkulla oru ulbeadhanam matramakunnu
38|88|oru kalayalavinu sesam itile vrttantam ninnalkk manas'silavuka tanne ceyyum
